pages.text: Gummybears can be interrupted during their hibernation,allowing for jellybeans to be rushed
pages.title: Jellybean Changes

pages.text: Amount of jellybeans made are dependant on the time taken for hibernation, with the max of 12 jellybeans for the full duration,Works with Sweetish Speedup
Feed a hibernating gummybear their matching color of fish to speedup hibernation
pages.title: Sweetish Speedup
